author: Matthew Hobkinson
title: Ricciardo needs F1 MIRACLE as Red Bull announce driver replacement - GPFans F1 Recap
text: Ricciardo needs F1 MIRACLE as Red Bull announce driver replacement - GPFans F1 Recap Ricciardo needs F1 MIRACLE as Red Bull announce driver replacement - GPFans F1 Recap Daniel Ricciardo isn't one for dwelling too much on the past, but it might be time to make a rare trip down memory lane. ➡️ READ MORE Red Bull replacement announced ahead of Italian GP A Red Bull driver has been announced as a replacement ahead of the Italian Grand Prix as the 2024 silly season shows no signs of slowing down. ➡️ https://www.gpfans.com/en/f1-news/1028842/red-bull-f1-oliver-goethe-franco-colapinto-williams-italian-gp/ Perez tipped to trigger Red Bull 'CIVIL WAR' after F1 race The lacklustre form of Sergio Perez could soon spark a 'civil war' at Red Bull, according to one former F1 driver. ➡️ https://www.gpfans.com/en/f1-news/1028875/red-bull-f1-sergio-perez-christian-horner-max-verstappen-helmut-marko/ F1 bosses consider MAJOR sprint race change to 2024 schedule Formula 1 chiefs will soon evaluate an exciting new idea which could become a reality at the end of this season. ➡️ https://www.gpfans.com/en/f1-news/1028797/f1-rookie-sprint-race-stefano-domenicali-abu-dhabi-2024/ F1 team break tradition with MAJOR shake-up ahead of Italian GP An F1 team have revealed a major shake-up ahead of the Italian Grand Prix in a huge break from tradition. ➡️ https://www.gpfans.com/en/f1-news/1028786/f1-ferrari-major-shakeup-italian-gp-monza-kit/ Newey team favourites ‘pushing’ to secure F1 deal A Formula 1 boss has revealed his team is doing everything within their power to secure the signing of Adrian Newey. ➡️ https://www.gpfans.com/en/f1-news/1028812/adrian-newey-f1-aston-martin-mike-krack-red-bull-deal/ Related Change your timezone: Latest News GPFans Recap Ricciardo needs F1 MIRACLE as Red Bull announce driver replacement -
